Name: Gemology EXP
Description:
Inspiration and experience accumulated through the work of Gemology practitioners gradually contribute to the advancement of their Gemology level and facilitate the mastery of various techniques.
During daily gathering, there's a chance to obtain bonus EXP.
Description$english:
Inspiration and experience accumulated through the work of Gemology practitioners gradually contribute to the advancement of their Gemology level and facilitate the mastery of various techniques.
During daily gathering, there's a chance to obtain bonus EXP.
Description2$english: "Whatever is in reason was first in experience."
